about.title: About 1TAP
about.subtitle: Every click counts, every holder is a 1Tapper
about.story: Born from a love of tactical FPS games and meme culture, 1TAP is more than just a coin‚Äîit's a movement. Built by gamers for gamers, with a clear vision: bring the competitive energy of tactical gaming into the crypto world.
about.story2: No VCs. No private presales. Just pure community.
about.communityDrivenText: Every decision is voted on by 1Tappers. Your voice matters.
about.liquidityLockedText: LP locked for 6 months. Full transparency, no rug pulls.
about.equilibratedLaunchText: Balanced distribution designed for community, liquidity, and long-term growth.
about.fairLaunchText: Fair distribution designed for long-term community growth.
about.toTheMoonText: Diamond hands, stronger taps. We're making history together.
about.disclaimerNote: Remember: Memecoins are highly speculative. Never invest more than you can afford to lose.

manifesto.title: The 1Tapper Manifesto
manifesto.subtitle: Our code. Our rules. Our community.
manifesto.preamble: We, the 1Tappers, united by our love of gaming and distrust of traditional finance, declare these truths to be self-evident: that all gamers are created equal, that we are endowed with certain unalienable rights, and that among these are Life, Liberty, and the pursuit of Headshots.

principle1.title: We Are Gamers First
principle1.description: This isn't about getting rich quick. It's about building something real for the community we love. Finance bros, turn back now.

principle2.title: No Whales, Only 1Tappers
principle2.description: We reject pump-and-dump schemes. We reject manipulation. Everyone here has an equal shot at success.

principle3.title: HODL Like a Pro Player
principle3.description: Great plays require patience. Diamond hands beat paper every time. Trust the process.

principle4.title: Memes Are Our Language
principle4.description: We don't take ourselves too seriously, but we take our community seriously. Culture first, profits second.

principle5.title: Transparency > Hype
principle5.description: No hidden agendas. No secret allocations. What you see is what you get. Always.

manifesto.welcomeMessage: You're now officially a 1Tapper. Check your email for exclusive updates.
manifesto.footerNote: By signing, you're joining a community that values transparency, gaming culture, and fair play above all else.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: We respect your privacy. This website does not collect, store, or process personal data by default.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.description: Our website operates with minimal data collection:
dataCollection.noPersonal: No personal information: We do not collect names, emails, or addresses
dataCollection.noCookies: No cookies: No tracking cookies are used on this website
dataCollection.noAnalytics: No analytics: We do not use analytics tools that track your behavior
dataCollection.blockchain: Blockchain interactions: Any wallet connections are handled directly by your wallet provider

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.description: When you interact with blockchain networks or decentralized exchanges (DEX), you are subject to their respective privacy policies:
thirdParty.wallets: Wallet providers (MetaMask, WalletConnect, etc.) have their own privacy policies
thirdParty.blockchain: Blockchain transactions are public and permanently recorded on the Base network
thirdParty.dex: DEX platforms may collect their own analytics and usage data

gdpr.title: Your Rights (GDPR)
gdpr.description: Under GDPR Article 13, you have the right to information about data processing. Since we do not collect personal data, there is no data to access, modify, or delete.
gdpr.blockchain: If you have questions about privacy or blockchain transactions, please note that blockchain data is immutable and cannot be deleted once recorded.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.description: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please reach out to us through our community channels listed on the main website.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.intro: By accessing and using this website, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provisions of this agreement.

useOfWebsite.title: Use of Website
useOfWebsite.description: This website and its contents are provided "as is" without any warranties, expressed or implied. We do not warrant the accuracy, completeness, or availability of the information, products, services, or related graphics contained on the website.

useOfWebsite.item3: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time

noFinancialAdvice.description: Any information provided is for entertainment and educational purposes only. You should conduct your own research and consult with qualified professionals before making any investment decisions.

liability.description: In no event shall 1TAP, its operators, or contributors be liable for any damages including, without limitation, direct or indirect, special, incidental, or consequential damages, losses or expenses arising in connection with this website or use thereof.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about $1TAP
faq.joinCommunity: Join our Discord community for real-time support from the team and community members.

general.a1: $1TAP is a community-driven meme coin on the Base network, inspired by competitive gaming culture. It combines gaming nostalgia with DeFi innovation, offering a tap-to-earn game, NFT drops, and a vibrant ecosystem.
general.a2: Base offers lightning-fast transactions, minimal fees, and Coinbase integration. Perfect for gaming features and mass adoption without the high costs of Ethereum mainnet.
general.q3: Is this affiliated with Valve or popular FPS games?
general.a3: No. $1TAP is an independent community project inspired by competitive gaming culture. We are not affiliated with, endorsed by, or connected to any game developers or publishers in any official capacity.
general.q4: What makes $1TAP different from other meme coins?
general.a4: Unique gaming theme, interactive tap-to-earn game, NFT drop roulette system, locked liquidity for 6 months, and real utility beyond speculation. Plus, our community is built by gamers, for gamers.

buying.a1:
1. Get a Web3 wallet (MetaMask, Coinbase Wallet)
2. Add Base network to your wallet
3. Buy ETH and bridge to Base
4. Swap ETH for $1TAP on Uniswap or our integrated DEX widget
5. Add $1TAP contract address to see your tokens
buying.a2: Contract address will be announced at launch on our official channels (Discord, Twitter). Always verify from our official sources to avoid scams.
buying.a3: We recommend 1-2% slippage for most trades. During high volatility, you may need to increase to 3-5%. Our 0% buy/sell tax means slippage is purely for DEX mechanics.
buying.q4: Can I buy with a credit card?
buying.a4: You can use on-ramp services like Moonpay or Coinbase to buy ETH with a card, then bridge to Base and swap for $1TAP. Direct fiat-to-$1TAP coming in Phase 2.

tokenomics.a1: Total supply: 1,000,000,000 $1TAP tokens. Fixed supply, no minting function. Deflationary through manual burns announced to community.
tokenomics.a2: ZERO taxes. 0% buy, 0% sell. We believe in fair trading without hidden fees. Liquidity is sustained through initial lock and community growth.
tokenomics.a3: Liquidity pool is locked for 6 months at launch via secure protocol. Lock proof will be published on our Security page. After initial period, community DAO votes on extension.
tokenomics.a4: Max transaction: 2% of total supply per trade. Max wallet: 3% of total supply. Prevents pump-and-dump schemes while allowing fair accumulation.
tokenomics.a5: Yes! Manual burns announced quarterly based on: 50% of marketplace fees, community vote thresholds, and milestone achievements. Transparent burn wallet tracking.

security.a1: Internal security audit completed (see Security page). External audit by Hacken scheduled for Phase 3. Contract is open-source and verified on BaseScan.
security.a2: No. Liquidity is locked, ownership is renounced post-launch, and contract has no mint function or admin withdrawals. Multi-sig wallet for community funds with transparent on-chain tracking.
security.q3: How do I verify I have real $1TAP?
security.a3: Always check the official contract address on our website and BaseScan. Scammers create fake tokens. Join our Discord for verification help.
security.q4: What if I find a security issue?
security.a4: Report to security@onetap.com immediately. We have a bug bounty program (details on Security page). Responsible disclosure is rewarded.

features.q1: How does the Tap-to-Earn game work?
features.a1: Tap the screen to earn XP, rank up through 10+ tiers (Bronze ‚Üí Global Elite), and unlock NFT drops. Higher ranks = rarer drops. Fully on-chain, play on web or mobile.
features.a2: Gaming-style loot system. Spin to win: Common skins (60%), Rare weapons (25%), Epic items (10%), Legendary prizes (5%). Trade or hold as NFTs. Marketplace coming Phase 2.
features.a3: Staking interface planned for Phase 3 (Month 2). Three lock periods: 7 days (5% APY), 30 days (12% APY), 90 days (25% APY). Rewards from ecosystem fees.
features.q4: Will there be a mobile app?
features.a4: Progressive Web App (PWA) launching Phase 4. Install from browser for native-like experience: offline mode, push notifications, portfolio tracking. Full iOS/Android apps if community votes yes.
features.a5: Phase 4 innovation: Track real competitive gaming performance, earn $1TAP rewards for achievements. Beta with 100 users first. Partnership discussions ongoing with major platforms.

community.a1: Join our Discord (link in footer), follow Twitter for updates, participate in meme contests, vote on DAO proposals, and help spread the word. Active contributors get special roles and rewards.
community.a2: Yes! Share your unique referral link, earn XP bonus for each signup, and climb the leaderboard for exclusive NFT airdrops. Top 50 referrers get monthly prizes.
community.a3: Phase 4 feature. Stake $1TAP to vote on: treasury spending, roadmap priorities, partnership approvals, and burn schedules. 1 token staked = 1 vote. Snapshot-based voting.
community.q4: Where can I see the team?
community.a4: Visit our Team page. Core members use pseudonyms for privacy (common in crypto). Doxxing is not required for legitimate projects. We prioritize transparency through code and actions.

team.title: Meet the Core 1Tappers
team.subtitle: Anonymous warriors building the future of gaming memecoins. We use pseudonyms for privacy, but our work speaks louder than names.

hugo.bio: Project founder with a passion for bridging gaming culture and Web3. Leading $1TAP from vision to execution with strategic planning and community-first approach.

tapdev.bio: Full-stack engineer with 8+ years in Web3. Smart contract security specialist who built DeFi protocols handling $10M+ TVL. Expert in Solidity, React, and Base network development.

growthmaster.bio: Crypto marketing strategist with proven track record in viral campaigns. Specialized in community growth and brand positioning. Led multiple projects from 0 to 100K+ holders.

communityguardian.bio: Dedicated community builder with experience managing 50K+ member Discord and Telegram communities. Expert in conflict resolution, engagement strategies, and creating vibrant ecosystems.

whyPseudonyms.title: Why We Use Pseudonyms
whyPseudonyms.paragraph1: In Web3 culture, pseudonyms are standard practice for good reason. Many of the most successful crypto projects (Bitcoin, Shiba Inu, Yearn Finance) were built by anonymous teams. What matters is transparency through code and actions, not personal identities.
whyPseudonyms.securityText: Doxxing in crypto can lead to targeted attacks, harassment, extortion attempts, and physical security risks for team members and their families. By using pseudonyms, we protect our team while maintaining full transparency in our work.
whyPseudonyms.focusText: Pseudonymity allows us to be judged purely on merit‚Äîon the quality of our code, the strength of our partnerships, and the value we deliver to the community. No distractions, just results.
whyPseudonyms.commitmentText: Fully audited smart contracts, locked liquidity, transparent on-chain operations, and open communication with the community. Judge us by our work, not our IDs. That's the Web3 way.

joinUs.title: Want to Join The Team?
joinUs.description: We're always looking for talented contributors: developers, designers, marketers, and community moderators. If you're passionate about gaming and Web3, reach out on Discord to help build the future of $1TAP.

lore.title: The Legend of 1TAP
lore.subtitle: From a single headshot to a global movement

chapter1.title: Chapter 1: The First Shot
chapter1.content: In the depths of competitive gaming servers, a legend was born. They called it the 'One Tap'‚Äîthe perfect shot, the ultimate display of skill. But this wasn't just about gaming. It was about precision, community, and the thrill of the game.

chapter2.title: Chapter 2: The Awakening
chapter2.content: As blockchain technology emerged, a group of passionate gamers saw an opportunity. What if the energy and culture of competitive gaming could merge with the decentralized revolution? What if every headshot could mean something more?

chapter3.title: Chapter 3: The Community Rises
chapter3.content: Word spread through Discord servers, Twitter threads, and gaming forums. The 1Tappers weren't just investors‚Äîthey were believers. United by a shared love for gaming and the dream of building something legendary.

chapter4.title: Chapter 4: The Launch
chapter4.content: With locked liquidity, zero taxes, and a community-first approach, $1TAP launched on Base network. Not as just another memecoin, but as a movement. Every holder became part of the story.

chapter5.title: Chapter 5: The Future
chapter5.content: The journey has only begun. NFT drops, tap-to-earn games, DAO governance‚Äîthe roadmap is ambitious. But with a community of true 1Tappers, nothing is impossible. This is our story. This is our legend.
